title: Fashion Princess - Dress Up for Girls
description: Join the ultimate 3D fashion game for girls! Dress up your princess, win fashion races, and impress the judges with stunning outfits. Unlock new models, hairstyles, and dances as you collect crystals. Show off your style and become a fashion queen—play now for free!
instructions: Design the perfect look and hairdo to wow the judges and score big! Let your imagination lead you to victory! Collect gems to open up new choices for models and dances. With more options, make magical looks come to life! Craft an avatar that's all yours and become a fashion royalty! We're cheering you on in this style adventure!

title: Magnetic Pull
description: Magnetic Pull is a physics-based puzzle game where players harness the power of magnetism to solve unique challenges across different levels. A magnet placed at the top of the screen can be switched on and off, allowing players to manipulate various metallic objects in the environment. As they progress through the game, they'll need to think creatively, utilizing magnetic forces to move, stack, and position elements to clear each level.
instructions: To move the magnet, players can either use the Arrow Keys or Click and Drag directly on the magnet to reposition it. The magnet can be switched on and off using "E" to attract or repel metallic objects, helping to solve puzzles and clear levels.

title: Cat From Hell Cat Simulator
description: Become the troublemaking cat in Cat From Hell - Cat Simulator. Run wild inside Granny’s house, knocking things over and making a mess, such as breaking plates, throwing balls, smashing fish tanks, etc. Escape before she catches you. Explore, prank, and cause chaos in this hilarious and mischievous cat simulator. Every corner hides a secret that can be destroyed, and discover new challenges.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Draw Brige Puzzle
description: Draw Bridge Puzzle Game is an exciting and challenging brain game that will put your problem-solving skills to the test. In this bridge-building adventure, your task is to draw paths for the car to safely navigate through obstacles and reach its destination. Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey of bridge construction and puzzle-solving as you draw roads to rescue the stranded car!
instructions: Follow the game instructions

title: Archery Master
description: With a dynamic progression system, players unlock powerful bows, master challenging mechanics like wind and moving targets, and climb the leaderboards. From stationary targets to tricky trajectories, each level will test your reflexes and skill.
instructions: Drag to aim and release to shoot. Don’t forget to pay attention to wind and target movement. Bows and arrows can be upgraded to improve accuracy, power, and aesthetics. Higher scores mean better rewards, and leaderboards track your performance.

title: The Big Hit Run
description: The Big Hit Run is a parkour game full of action! You will fly through colorful and vibrant cities. Avoid obstacles flexibly and keep running. Collect gems and power items. Watch your powers grow, with unbeatable arms.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Snake Hunter
description: "Snake Hunter" – Giant serpents are invading our homeland! Grab your weapons, fortify our defenses, and slay the monstrous snakes to protect our land. In this game, you play as a guardian, battling each segment of the serpent's massive body. Collect skills and upgrade buffs dropped by the snakes to enhance your weapon's power and abilities. As you face different serpents across various levels, you'll need to strategically choose skills to counter their attacks and emerge victorious.
instructions: Swipe up/down to move your character and attack the giant serpent!

title: Rollance Going Balls
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Rollance Going Balls. This is an exciting and casual platform game. Control your colorful ball and roll it across a variety of well-designed platforms. Each jump and roll is like a “Rollance” performance full of luck and skill. Watch out for moving hammers.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Home Rush The Fish War
description: Engage in an epic battle between Humans and The Fish! Your goal is simple: drag and hold to move the Human to the perfect spot to defeat The Fish. Watch out for obstacles and tough enemies along the way. Take down The Fish, then return safely to the starting point. But remember, only Humans of the same color can defeat The Fish! Experience exciting levels with increasing challenges, stunning 3D visuals, unique characters, and easy-to-learn controls for all ages. Enjoy the adventure!
instructions: Follow the game instructions!

title: Dress Up Run
description: Dress Up Run – The Ultimate Fashion Race! Get ready for the most stylish and exciting fashion runway challenge! In Dress Up Run, you’ll sprint down the runway, collecting trendy outfits, glamorous accessories, and stunning hairstyles to create the perfect look. But be careful—choose the right pieces to match the theme and impress the crowd! Can you complete the race with the best outfit and become a true fashion icon?
instructions: Swipe to run

title: Meow Market
description: In Meow Market, players take on the role of a charming white tabby cat running a bustling vegetable shop. To keep the business thriving, players must harvest fresh veggies by engaging in a click-match puzzle game. Selecting grouped matching vegetables to harvest them efficiently. Each harvest consumes one move, which regenerates over time, encouraging strategic decision-making.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to interact with in game elements.

title: Obby +1 Pet Every Seconds
description: Are you ready to become the owner of the coolest pet collection? Merge them, upgrade buildings and open new islands! The game offers you: - A constant influx of new pets - collect, merge and open rare ones! - Upgrade your lab, market and home for even more opportunities - Sell pets, earn money and build your empire Open all the islands, pump up your pets to the maximum and create your own pet empire in "Obby +1 Pet Every Second"!
instructions: To become a pet master, you need to: - Collect pets - they appear every second! - Merge pets into stronger ones with each level. - Upgrade your lab, market, and house for more efficient merging and selling. - Sell pets for money to develop your island. - Open new islands by upgrading your collection. - Reach the maximum pet level and become a real tycoon!

title: Deadflip Frenzy
description: Deadflip Frenzy is a wild stunt-flipping action game where chaos meets style! Launch your character into the air, pull off insane flips, twists, and bone-crunching landings — all in the name of fun (and maybe a little destruction). Bounce off trampolines, launch from cannons, smash through obstacles, and aim for the most outrageous combos. The more insane your flip, the higher your score. But beware — one bad landing and it’s ragdoll mayhem!
instructions: mouse only

title: Ultimate Destruction Simulator
description: Unleash your destructive side in this ultimate demolition experience! Enjoy realistic tower destruction with dynamic physics, and take control of time—slow it down, speed it up, or freeze the action. Experiment with gravity modes, from low to high or even zero gravity, and customize every detail, including debris levels, destructibility, and atmospheric dust. Built for fans of destruction, this game offers the smash-and-crash fun you've been craving!
instructions: From the computer, press the LMB (Left Mouse Button) to shoot. Movement on WASD (and QE to raise the camera). Mouse wheel up/down - speeds up (slows down) time. T - starts the timer to explode the installed charges. F - stop time. B - weaponry. Escape (2 times) - menu. The rest is through the game interface. For mobile use your fingers and game interface :)

title: Typing Adventure
description: Get ready for a fast-paced typing challenge in Typing Adventure! Type the words above each enemy to defeat them before they get too close. The longer you survive, the faster they come! How long can your fingers keep up? Battle endless waves and test your speed in this thrilling typing survival game!
instructions: Type the text that appear above enemy

title: Tunnel Road
description: Tunnel Road is an adrenaline-filled arcade game that requires quick reflexes, sharp focus and a great visual reaction! Keep up with the speed, avoid obstacles and cover the longest distance while advancing in a colorful and dynamic tunnel!
instructions: When the game starts, select 1 or 2-player mode. Avoid obstacles in the tunnel by dodging to the right or left. PLAYER 1: - Use "A" or "LEFT ARROW" to move left. - Use "D" or "RIGHT ARROW" to move right. PLAYER 2: "LEFT ARROW" to move left. "RIGHT ARROW" to move right. Use touch controls on mobile devices (tablets and phones). The longer you last, the higher your score. Stay focused to keep up with the tempo of the game!

title: Block Blaster Puzzle
description: Aim for high scores or complete level objectives. Rotate and arrange blocks to clear rows and columns while enjoying stunning visuals. Each perfect move brings satisfaction, challenging you to beat your best and master each puzzle!
instructions: The game offers endless levels where players move and match colored blocks to complete rows or columns. Scoring high is essential before the board fills up. 17 unique blocks can be rotated in any of the 4 directions, making strategic placement crucial to success.

title: Split Shot: Ball Adventure
description: Drag the ball, set your direction, and navigate through a cosmic field! Collect all the stars while skillfully avoiding dangerous spikes. How many can you gather?
instructions: Press and hold to drag the ball, setting its direction and power. Let go to launch the ball toward your desired path. Collect stars and avoid spikes to progress through the level.

title: Burger Tycoon
description: Start your journey as the owner of a small burger joint and work your way up to building a massive fast food empire! Take full control of every aspect of the business—from grilling delicious burgers and serving customers to managing staff and expanding your restaurant chain. Upgrade your kitchen, optimize your workflow, and attract more customers to grow your brand. Can you turn your humble burger stand into the ultimate fast food empire?
instructions: Swipe on the screen to move your character around the restaurant. Prepare delicious burgers, serve customers, and manage your fast food business efficiently. Expand your restaurant and grow your burger empire!

title: Russian Fishing at Sea
description: Travel through different seas, catch fish in a variety of magical places. In our game, very many unique bodies of water. Game features: - more than 100 kinds of fish; - a lot of unique water bodies; - cool fishing gear; - various tasks; - aquariums where you can grow and sell fish.
instructions: The ruler appears when you press the button all the way down, and you can cast the rod at any time by releasing the button. The hook icon that will appear soon is a sign that the fish is biting. Press the button when the sign appears for 3 seconds. Adjust the tension by releasing and tightening. The distance shortens quickly if you pull too long, and you will be able to catch the fish if the fish's health or distance is 0

title: Nail Queen
description: Nail Queen – The Ultimate Nail Art & Manicure Game! Welcome to Nail Queen, the most stylish and satisfying nail salon game! Get ready to unleash your creativity by designing stunning nail art, trendy manicures, and dazzling styles for your clients. With hundreds of colors, patterns, stickers, and gems, you can create the most unique and fashionable nail designs! Whether you love glitter, matte, or neon, this game has it all!
instructions: Pick a nail shape – Square, oval, almond, or stiletto? Choose trendy nail polish colors – Glossy, matte, or glitter? Decorate with gems, stickers & accessories – Add a touch of glam! ✨ Complete fun nail challenges & unlock new designs Satisfying ASMR effects – Enjoy the relaxing nail makeover!

title: Super Pop Blast
description: Get ready for a new kind of brick shooter, with unique mechanics, rewarding challenges, and colorful levels. The object: Clear all the blocks using a limited number of balls. Plan your moves, use the score combo system, and try to get 3 stars!
instructions: Use the mouse or a finger to hold and drag across the screen to aim. Release to shoot. Destroy all blocks to continue.

title: Dragon Castle: Idle TD
description: Enter a colorful world where cardboard, watercolor, and stickers come to life! Play as a mighty dragon defending your fortress from relentless waves of fiery enemies. Upgrade your castle, enhance your dragon’s talents, and unlock powerful abilities in the Dragonatory lab!
instructions: Upgrade permanent stats outside battles using gold and temporary stats during battles with silver. Unlock new talents in the Lab scene using crystals. Collect daily rewards and bonuses. Take part in events and battles.

title: Purrfect Scoops
description: Welcome to Purr-fect Scoops, Run your own ice cream shop, serving up delightful cones and cups to a menagerie of animal customers. Choose from a variety of flavors. Unlock new cups, flavors, and toppings to expand your menu and attract even more customers. Use power-ups like the Coin Multiplier and Tip Booster to maximize your profits and become the ultimate ice cream tycoon. With its charming visuals and addictive gameplay, Purr-fect Scoops is sure to delight your day.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to interact with in game element.

title: Space Pin Master - Pull Pin Puzzle
description: Relax and challenge your brain with Space Pin Master! Enjoy satisfying pull pin puzzles in a space adventure full of gravity-based fun. Free the balls, avoid bombs and obstacles to fill the spaceship. Spin to win coins and unlock new balls, pins, spaceships, and themes. Simple yet addictive gameplay with stunning graphics and innovative levels. Ready to become the pull pin master? Jump in and start the space puzzle adventure!
instructions: Tap or click to pull out the pin and collect all the Colourful balls in the spaceship.

title: Enchanted Easter Adventure
description: Step into a magical springtime world in Enchanted Easter Adventure, where Lily and adorable bunny come together to celebrate Easter! This whimsical game combines storytelling, mini-puzzles, character dress-up, and holiday cheer in one unforgettable journey.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Obby On a Bike
description: Obby On a Bike, a thrilling bike-riding platformer that combines exciting obstacle courses with fun parkour gameplay! It features two exciting gameplay modes: Normal and Challenge. In Normal mode, you can carefully ride through each level without the stress of a timer. Challenge mode lets you test your speed and skill as you race against time. Whether you're playing alone or competing head-to-head in the 2 Player mode, there's always a thrilling challenge awaiting you!
instructions: Player 1: Move: W,A,S,D or (ARROW KEYS - in 1 Player game mode) Run: L-SHIFT Jump: SPACE Camera control: MOUSE and RIGHT-CLICK Zoom In/Out: MOUSE SCROLL Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Run: K Jump: L

title: Hidden Easter Egg Hunt
description: Dive into the fun world of Hidden Easter Egg Hunt, a fun and relaxing hidden object game for players of all ages! Explore colorful spring landscapes filled with blooming flowers, green fields, and playful bunnies as you search for hidden Easter eggs scattered around the game board. With charming graphics and a festive feel, this game is perfect for getting into the Easter spirit. Test your observation skills, challenge your attention to detail, and enjoy the joyful hunt!
instructions: Your goal is to find all the hidden Easter eggs in each level before time runs out. Some eggs are easy to spot, while others are cleverly hidden among background details. Tap or click on each egg when you find it. If you get stuck, use the hint.

title: Doggo Drop
description: Doggo Drop is a cosy puzzle game where players guide an energetic Shiba Inu as it drops numbered blocks. Land the right blocks to merge them, and reach the best possible score!
instructions: Swipe left, right and down or use the arrow keys.

title: Save the crop
description: Save the Crop is an exciting arcade game where you control a tractor to rescue crops from fire! ?? Quickly cut and collect crops before they burn, then stack and sell them to earn money. Use your earnings to upgrade your tractor, buy storage houses, and explore new fields. Navigate using joystick controls and master the art of saving and farming in this fast-paced, action-packed game!
instructions: Move the tractor using the joystick. Cut the crops before the fire spreads. Stack and collect harvested crops. Sell crops to earn money. Upgrade tractor & expand storage to save more fields.

title: GT Flying Car Racing
description: GT Flying Car Racing is an exhilarating game where players race high-speed GT cars that can transform into flying machines! Navigate through challenging tracks, perform daring aerial maneuvers, and switch seamlessly between driving and flying modes. Avoid obstacles, compete against rivals, and master both land and air racing to become the ultimate champion!
instructions: mouse only

title: Hero Merge
description: Hero Merge is an exciting tower defense game where strategy and firepower combine! Merge your heroes to create stronger units, strategically position them on grid, and defend your wall against waves of different enemies. Unlimited waves, plenty of perks and many different units! Will your heroes stand strong, or will the enemies break through?
instructions: Everything is controlled by mouse or touch if on a device with a touchscreen

title: Hit Knock Down
description: Hit & Knock Down is a fun casual game where you aim to throw baseballs. Shoot as many targets as possible. Test your precision, reaction speed, and throwing skills. You aim to hit the right targets in each level. The goals at the level are very varied, such as wood, stone, etc. Each level presents different targets. You should hit with a baseball.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Block LEGENDS!
description: Drag and match blocks! Block LEGENDS! is a casual puzzle game, where you drag and arrange blocks on a board. Once you form a line, either horizontally or vertically, you clear that line, and along with that, you may find - diamonds, bombs and score multipliers! Finish missions - earn rewards! Missions reset every few minutes, so keep the grind on!? Once you have enough diamonds, you can buy Bombs and NUKES☢️! You can use these powerups to breeze through levels! Made with ❤️ by Realinspirer
instructions: Use Touch/Mouse to control and navigate through the game

title: Block Combo Blast
description: Enjoy a classic block puzzle game with exciting jewel blast gameplay and stunning visuals! Solve 1800+ challenging levels, earn combos, and climb the global leaderboard. Train your brain, relax with soothing sounds, and compete with friends for the top spot!
instructions: Drag and drop the tiles onto the grid. Fill each row or column to score! There are three tiles to choose from. If none of the three tiles are placeable on the grid, it's game over.

title: Nuts & Bolts Sort: Color Puzzle
description: Nuts & Bolts Sort: Color Puzzle – A Satisfying Sorting Challenge! Are you ready to put your sorting and logic skills to the test? In Nuts & Bolts Sort: Color Puzzle, your goal is to match and organize nuts and bolts by color to solve each puzzle. It looks easy at first, but as you progress, the challenges become increasingly tricky! Can you complete every level and become the ultimate sorting master?
instructions: ✔️ Tap & move nuts and bolts to the correct place ✔️ Sort by color and match them correctly ✔️ Use strategy & logic to solve complex puzzles ✔️ Complete each level and unlock exciting new challenges!

title: Finger Soccer Tournament
description: Select your team and score more goals than your opponent to become the champion! Choose between single-player tournament mode (against AI) or challenge a friend in 2-player mode. Multiplayer mode is available only on mobile devices.
instructions: Touch and hold the screen to move the paddle. Defend your goal and make more goals than your opponent.

title: Race Time
description: Race through thrilling tracks in your speedy car! Collect gears to charge up your booster and unleash a powerful speed burst. Upgrade your car to unlock better performance and purchase the fastest vehicles to dominate the competition. Use the super boost to knock opponents off the track, climb the leaderboard, and prove you're the ultimate racer. Beat the clock and challenge your friends online!
instructions: Use the 'A' and 'D' keys or drag your finger left and right to move your car between the three lanes, hit 'S' or double tap the screen when the Super Boost is ready to activate it!

title: Merge Flow
description: "Merge Flow" is a casual puzzle game, by the board of 5*7 number squares and the bottom n +/- operators, each of the blocks have numbers, use the operator to make the number square +/-n, the same number will be combined into a +1 number, while obtaining the corresponding score. When the operators run out, the round ends.
instructions: Mouse click the box on the game board, use the operator to the number +/-n, get a higher score, a higher level!

title: Squid Game Original
description: n this game you will find the fun of all the games. We have collected the best and combined them into one whole. You will have to play all the popular games from the "Squid Game". However, remember: there should only be one winner left in the end. All games are carefully recreated based on the original games. You will fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of each of them, enjoying all the game modes.
instructions: The game has 7 levels, in each level you will be explained the rules of the game. Control in the game: WASD-move. Space — jump (not used everywhere). Left Shift — freeze (only for the game "Red Light - Green Light"). Mouse — action. Escape-pause.

title: Word Rush
description: Word Rush combines solitaire mechanics with word puzzles for a unique and addictive experience! Clear lettered cards by forming words, drawing new cards from the deck to create high-scoring combinations. Each move opens up fresh opportunities, keeping the game exciting and dynamic. With endless word possibilities, Word Rush offers fun for everyone, from casual players to word puzzle enthusiasts. Challenge your vocabulary and strategy skills in this thrilling game!
instructions: Use left mouse button to interact with any element

title: Galaxy Carnage
description: Battle in space with countless enemies and their bosses coming in waves. Lots of weapons, lots of lasers, lots of explosions and effects. Upgrade the starship to the most powerful machine for exterminating alien invaders.
instructions: Controls: (WASD) - moving, LMB - shooting, SPACE - death ray, F - shield. The ship is upgraded automatically. For mobile devices: movement - swipe on the left side of the screen, shooting - swipe on the right side of the screen, virtual buttons on the screen.

title: Cat Evolution
description: Embark on a paws-itively thrilling journey of discovery and creativity in Cat Evolution! Combine adorable cats to unlock hilarious and surprising new species. From cuddly kittens to fantastical hybrids, every merge brings you closer to unveiling the ultimate evolution. Merge & Unlock Cats Evolutions. Build Your Cat Universe!
instructions: Use mouse or touch to interact with in game elements.

title: Popping Sushi
description: Drop adorable sushi pieces into the field and watch them merge! When two identical pieces touch, they combine into a bigger, tastier creation. Aim for the ultimate sushi roll and claim the top spot on the global leaderboard!
instructions: Move the sushi left or right with the mouse or by swiping. Click or lift your finger from the screen to drop a piece.

title: Glitch
description: Glitch is a 2D platformer game where you must solve challenging puzzles to overcome the glitching platform and reach the finish door. Get ready for a gaming experience like no other, whether you’re a fan of puzzles, action, or platformers. Start your adventure! Innovative Puzzle Mechanics: Tackle a range of puzzles designed to test your problem-solving abilities. Each level offers a unique brain teaser, from classic logic challenges to cutting-edge new mechanics.
instructions: AD / Left Right Arrow Key = to move Left / Right W / Up Arrow / Space = to Jump

title: Head Jump
description: run, jump, and climb to avoid direct collisions. Head Jump is a casual game, with a very fast runner forcing you to have a quick response to avoid obstacles, beautiful music will make you addicted to playing this game, difficult levels will stimulate tension and challenge adrenaline, complete each level to continue to improve your playing skills.
instructions: press space or left mouse click to jump

title: Car Escape
description: Car Escape Game is an addictive and challenging puzzle game. It will help you train your brain. The operation of the game is very simple, move the horizontally parked cars to the left and right, move the vertically parked cars up and down, and finally drive the red fire truck to the rightmost exit of the parking lot and the game will be successful.
instructions: Move the horizontally parked cars to the left and right, vertically parked cars to the top and bottom, and finally drive the red fire truck to the rightmost exit of the parking lot, then the game is successful.

title: Bobblehead Ball
description: Are you a guy who is a talented with skills and speed? If yes, let's score. Bubblehead Ball is a thrilling and fast-paced football game where you can challenge your opponents and show your abilities. One more thing, all of our characters in game are not in football world.
instructions: Use your keyboard to play. Arrow to moving and S for jump, D for kick

title: Snow Rush 3D
description: Snow Rush 3D is a fun sledding game that tests speed and reflexes for winter sports enthusiasts, playable in both 1 and 2 players! Try to reach the longest distance by overcoming obstacles and ramps on a challenging snow-covered track, or challenge your friend! Snowmen, obstacles and tricky turns await you along the way. How far can you go and how many gifts can you collect?
instructions: PLAYER 1: A,D: Left/Right Movements W or SPACE: Jump PLAYER 2: RIGHT / LEFT ARROWS: Left / Right Movements UP ARROW: Jump On Mobile Devices: Only 1 Player mode is enabled on mobile devices. Tap left and right on the screen to move left and right. Tap with two fingers to jump.

title: Save Seafood
description: Save Seafood is an exciting puzzle game where you help sea animals escape from being trapped in a tangled mess! The goal is to move and rearrange the animals to free them from the crowd. Solve each puzzle by carefully maneuvering the creatures until they’re all safely separated. Can you untangle the sea and set the animals free?
instructions: Use left mouse to click
developer: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.
